## Open-Ended Questions

### AI vs Human Learning

- **Very Different!**[^different-example], 回答思路: 
    - 尽管神经网络 inspired by human brain
    - 但:

        | | AI | Human |
        |---|---|---|
        | **Learning** | Trained + Forward Pass | Constant Learning |
        | | Large Data | Few Shots |
        | **Reasoning**[^reasoning] | One Direction | Highly Distributed |
        | **Error Behavior** | Hallucination (幻觉) | Confabulation (脑补) |
        | **Embodiment** | No (Lack common sense knowledge) | Yes |

[^different-example]: 比如 counting the number of 'r's in the word 'strawberry'. 也许对于机器来讲下围棋最困难的也许在于如何 pick up the piece and place it on the board.

[^reasoning]: Distributivity / Decentralized 也是 emergence 的一个重要来源. 例子 Conway's Game of Life, Simulation of Life (Youtube), etc. 实现真正 AGI 的一个重要方向. Only magic can defeat magic. GNN 模仿了这个特点.
